column2:
<value> as follows, defaults in brackets:
TIME_FACTOR, 120 # (1) [integer] amount by which the sim is speeded up relative to real time 
FRAME_RATE, 6 # (max 6 Hz) [integer] iteration time for main sim loop
SNAPSHOT_INTERVAL, 600 # (600) time in seconds of sim time between state vector dumps; values <= 0 switch it off
NUM_HD_CUM_PWR_DISP, average # (average) average or total values shown in control panel numeric header
REAL_TIME, True # whether the frame rate is synched to real time or not
MAX_DIFFICULTY, 4 # determines volatility of static models & scale of storage elements
AUTO_SUPERVISOR, True # False
AUTO_SUPERVISOR_DIFFICULTY, 2
AUTO_SUPERVISOR_START_TIME_OPTION, 1 # beginning = 0, now = 1, any time = 2
AUTO_SUPERVISOR_RUN_TIME_DAYS, 1 # 0 - 365... 
AUTO_SUPERVISOR_RUN_TIME_HOURS, 0 # 0 - 23
AUTO_SUPERVISOR_RUN_TIME_MINUTES, 0 # 0 - 59
